scripts.predev: npm run build --workspace=packages/shared && npm run build --workspace=packages/mcp
scripts.dev: concurrently -n "shared,mcp,backend,frontend" -c "gray,gray,green,blue" --handle-input --default-input-target frontend "npm run dev --workspace=packages/shared" "npm run dev --workspace=packages/mcp" "sleep 2 && npm run dev --workspace=packages/backend" "npm run dev --workspace=packages/frontend"
scripts.dev:backend: npm run build --workspace=packages/shared && npm run build --workspace=packages/mcp && npm run dev --workspace=packages/backend
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=packages/shared && npm run build --workspace=packages/mcp && npm run build --workspaces --if-present
